item.title:
RT by @PulpLibrarian: Today marks what would have been Ray Harryhausen's 102nd birthday.
Please share your memories of this legendary filmmaker today, as we today reflect on the incredible legacy he has left for us all to enjoy.
#RayHarryhausen
item.dc:creator: @Ray_Harryhausen
item.description:
Today marks what would have been Ray Harryhausen's 102nd birthday.

Please share your memories of this legendary filmmaker today, as we today reflect on the incredible legacy he has left for us all to enjoy.

#RayHarryhausen
